They say that if we buy kindle from them, they will register an Amazon account with valid US Debit Card and US billing address. That means, I don't have to register for another amazon account,right? and can I use Maybank Amex to purchase books afterwards or i still have to use the Use debit card? I'm still confused with this whole process. Thanks for the help.:)
